alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 11:16PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... A circulation (Invest 93W), located near 14N146E is anticipated to continue to slowly move off to the west-northwest. This feature is being monitored by the Joint Typhoon Warning Center. Additional circulations may develop along a surface trough that is in the region. Rainfall: Periods of locally heavy rainfall are likely through Wednesday morning, with rainfall totals of 3 to 5 inches possible through Wednesday morning, locally higher amounts possible. Folks in the Marianas should keep up to date with the latest statements and advisories from the National Weather Service and your local emergency management offices. Forecast products issued by the National Weather Service are posted on the WFO Guam web page at www.weather.gov/gum.
